name: Tennis Story
description: A tennis game that's not about what happens on the court. It's about being young, not having a care in the world. It's about the adventures with your friends you'll remember for the rest of your life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.7 ghz or higher Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: Low requirements Sound Card: None
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 ghz or higher Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: Low requirements Sound Card: None
